category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MEDesign_default_non_bom_align_mode
preference.preference_description: Specifies whether to create a light or heavy alignment when pasting a design revision to the "RepresentedBy" Pseudo folder of "PartRevision" in MyTeamcenter application. Valid Values: light - Represents light alignment. heavy - Represents heavy alignment. Values are not case sensitive. Teamcenter needs to be restarted for any value change to take effect.
